content:encoded:
An action-packed western about the first Colt six-shooter, the California gold fields, and a double-crossing dance hall queen.

Original Air Date: January 03, 1950
Host: Andrew Rhynes
Show: Western Stories
Phone: (707) 98 OTRDW (6-8739)

Stars:
• Gerald Mohr
• Betty Lou Gerson
• Charles McGraw
• Will Geer

Special Guests:
• Eddie Marr

Writers:
• Les Crutchfield

Producer:
• William N. Robson

Music:
• Del Castillo

Exit music from: Roundup on the Prairie by Aaron Kenny https://bit.ly/3kTj0kK
